name: The Edibles
description:
Survive on an alien planet
Play through procedurally generated, ever-changing environments, each filled with hard-to-capture monsters and giant bosses to keep you alive. Fight and defeat bosses hiding in huge castles to get your hands on the magical orbs. A unique scaling system allows you and your enemies to grow stronger indefinitely throughout the game.

Powerful evolution system
Defeat different monsters that can be found in each of the three environments to gain unique genetic information. Mix them together or use them individually to build your own unique evolutionary tree. Repeated evolutions require more genetic information and grant more power. Perform a limited number of evolutions and make the traits you evolve stronger.
